name: The grim reaper uses his scythe as intended for once
name_original: The grim reaper uses his scythe as intended for once
description:
A mostly unfinished little farming game featuring our good friend the reaper

AWSD - to move

tab - to open and close buy menu

walk to seedbox and select seed - to choose which seed you want to plant

click on land when tab menu isn't open - to plant seeds

wait around - to grow plants

touch the plants - to harvest and make money back!

Since there wasn't a way to balance the game in time, I tried to make an editable text file where you can change the sell prices of crops by hand, although it might not function.

A game made by me for the Gamecraft jam. theme: harvest

no real ending, but if you want, you can buy every shred of land in existence.

pumpkins should take around 30 seconds to grow, birch trees one minute, and roses two minutes
